name: Cheesy Buffalo Chicken Dip
author: MLALAK
summary: This hot dip is perfect for a tailgate party or anytime! Shredded chicken, cream cheese, hot sauce and lots of melted cheese create a wonderful buffalo wing flavor on a chip or with veggie sticks.
ingredients: ⅓ cup hot pepper sauce (such as Frank's RedHot®)
directions: Place chicken breasts in a large saucepan; cover with water
Boil until cooked through, about 20 minutes
Pull meat from bones and skin
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Heat olive oil in large skillet
Stir in celery; cook until soft
Mix in the cream cheese, blue cheese dressing, and ranch dressing
Cook and stir until smooth and creamy
Stir in the shredded chicken and hot sauce
Spoon mixture into an 8x8 baking dish
Bake in preheated oven until golden and bubbly, about 30 minutes
